name: Case of Magic Sweat-(12 to a Case)
description: Magic Sweat’s scientifically formulated créme stands above and beyond all work out and weight loss enhancers on the market today. A key ingredient is Pure Cocoa Butter, which contains a natural Anti-Oxidant rich in vitamin B Complex. Pure Coca Butter creates a natural skin  moisurizer for softening the skin, allowing the skin to hydrate, preventing and diminishing stretch marks, rises to a higher melt temperature, speeds up the miniaturization rate, and water loss. Magic Sweat has  beneficial protection to prevent  Bacteria and Fungus from developing on the skin. This unique blend of  ingredients acts as a barrier créme when applied to the skin.
